summary: Male redguard follower based on my character with ranged and one handed fighting style. He wears custom themed armor and can be found in camp, where he lives. You can marry him too, and recruit whenever you want. Just be nice to him, please :)
descriptionHtml:
[URL=http://minus.com/llOnYfsER1ztU][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jlOnYfsER1ztU.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

[b]{INTRODUCTION}[/b]
First of all - this is my first attempt with Creation Kit - so be nice to me, please :)

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

C\'asteo can be found near Geirmund\'s Hall. In the morning he stays in his camp - he cooks, warms hands by fire or just sits there and watches. After lunch (around 1 PM) he goes to work at Sarethi farm. He stays there until night - then he returns to his camp where he sleeps. One day in the week (thursday) he will visit Ivarstead, work there - then go to inn and head back to his camp at night.
 
He is a standalone NPC, and his equipment are a hunting bow and an iron dagger. He wears [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29815]custom themed armor.[/url]  You can marry him too, and recruit whenever you want. He is essential by default. Just be nice to him, please :)

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[b]{TO DO}[/b]
This mod is still in progress, there are lots of things I\'d like to add - but now I\'m not able to do it with my knowledge of CK.

? custom voice & dialogue
? his unique camp (not edited vanilla) with Hircine shrine
? unique custom weapon
? optional dialogue for werewolf transformation
? make him hunt animals near camp
? custom / unique combat style

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[b]{REQUIRED MODS}[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair Male[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722]The Eyes of Beauty[/url]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[b]{RECOMMENDED MODS}[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods]Geonox Face Maps for Men[/url]

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[b]{CREDITS & MY THANKS!}[/b]
highonsunday - for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15641]Better Male Presets[/url]
Apachii - for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]
LogRamm - for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722]the Eyes of Beauty[/url]
Frandema & Cabal - for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29815]Wanderer Cuirass[/url] 
Alexsilvestre - for his betatesting and answer to all my annoying questions :)
Greyblood - for his betatesting
Regnbagar - for her betatesting
Carah - to help me with creating sandbox
Bethseda - for Skyrim


[b]{PERMISSION}[/b]
Have fun with your new follower. Please do not upload the mod to Steam Workshop, thank you.

[URL=http://minus.com/lgaQ9zIlb0qra][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jgaQ9zIlb0qra.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
author: Miriam
